title: About
text:
I am an applied economist and environmental scientist. My research focuses on:

Climate change and land use impacts on economic systems
Environmental policy analysis
Econometric and spatial modeling

I enjoy turning complex data into actionable insights.

title: Home
text:
Hello, I’m Eva Benson
Applied Economist • Environmental Scientist

I study the economic impacts of climate change and environmental policy.
I research the impacts of climate change and land use change on economic systems.
I build reproducible econometric and spatial analysis models.

Check out my GitHub

title: Contact
text:
You can reach me at: evasophieb@comcast.net (Personal) or bens1369@umn.edu (University)
Or connect on GitHub.

title: Projects
text:
Here are some of my research projects:

Microplastics in the Cannon River Watershed
Investigating the environmental impacts of microplastics in the Cannon River Watershed, focusing on the impact of stream morphology on microplastic distribution.
Ski Resort Climate and Economics Study
Analyzing how climate variables like snowfall, temperature, and snowmaking technology influence the economic performance of ski resorts and regional tourism in Colorado.
Trade and Fertility Research
Exploring how trade openness impacts fertility rates in Central America.
